---
```{r}
a=matrix(2:11,nrow=5)
b=matrix(10:19,nrow=2)
a
b
# Matrix addition
c=t(b)
a+c
# Matrix Multiplication
a%*%b
```

Arrays (N dimensional)
```{r}
d=array(1:16, dim=c(4,2,2))
d
d[,,2]
d[,1,1]
```
